page.title: AngoraSix — Turn Your Idea Into Reality
page.description: We help visionaries and entrepreneurs structure, organize, and bring their ideas to life with purpose, fairness, and proven methodologies.

hero.title: Turn Your Idea Into Reality
hero.subtitle: Bring momentum and clarity to your project
hero.description: The hardest step isn’t having an idea, it’s making it real. We help you move forward — bringing structure, clarity, and fairness to bridge that gap.

value.title: Ideas need more than inspiration — they need structure
value.subtitle: Great ideas deserve a clear and fair foundation. We bring the frameworks and guidance to help your team move forward.

clarity.title: Clarity & Fairness Foundation
clarity.description: Set clear roles, rules, and fair ownership from the start — building trust and alignment across your team.

fairness.title: Quick Results
fairness.description: Lean Startup-inspired support to validate fast, learn quickly, and show progress without wasting energy.

momentum.title: Sustainable Momentum
momentum.description: Lightweight methodologies that keep your project moving forward without overwhelming your team with process.

process.title: How We Turn Ideas Into Successful Projects
process.subtitle: A step-by-step process that transforms vision into a structured project — with clarity, alignment, and traction.

assess.title: Assess Team Readiness
assess.description: We surface roles, risks, and motivations early so your team starts aligned and avoids costly missteps later.

define.title: Define Base Rules
define.description: Set clear rules for decisions, ownership, and contributions — so everyone knows what’s fair from day one.

methodology.title: Adopt Lightweight Methodology
methodology.description: Use lightweight versions of Scrum, Lean Startup, and Design Thinking to build momentum without overloading your team.

platform.title: Introduce AngoraSix
platform.description: Bring in AngoraSix to track contributions and align rewards transparently — without adding extra work.

metrics.title: Set Clear Metrics
metrics.description: Define short- and mid-term goals that give direction and motivation, without overcomplicating the process.

partnership.title: Guidance for Lasting Foundations
partnership.description: Think of us as a trusted advisor — similar to an incubator, but with no strings attached and focused on your project’s internal alignment and sustainable collaboration.
partnership.approach: We prioritize trust, clarity, and shared purpose. With AngoraSix, you’re not just building a product — you’re building the foundations for a project that can thrive on its own.

cta.title: Let's have an exploratory call
cta.description: Ready to turn your idea into a structured, actionable project? We’ll explore together how AngoraSix can support you in building something meaningful.
